title: Drawing, "Mount Pichincha from Chillo, Ecuador", June 26, 1857
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on greyish paper
markings: Verso:  Stamped in ink, at lower right:  Lugt 457 d
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with numbers throughout, and at upper right:  2- orange brown - grss - light/ 3- between 2& 4/ 4- Cool beautiful green / 5- Furrows of salmon gray / very light; and at bottom right:  Pichincha June 26th Chillo
description: Horizontal view of a peak rising from a mountain range across upper portion of the sheet

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Mount Pichincha from Chillo, Ecuador", June 26, 1857.
June 26, 1857. Graphite, brush and white gouache on greyish paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-1336.
